title: go.tools/cmd/godoc: TestCLI fails on windows
body:
C:\go\path\others\src\code.google.com\p\go.tools\cmd\godoc>hg id
7fd88521490f tip

C:\go\path\others\src\code.google.com\p\go.tools\cmd\godoc>go test -run=CLI
--- FAIL: TestCLI (10.08 seconds)
        godoc_test.go:103: godoc nonexistingpkg =
                2014/04/04 17:22:22 open c:\go\root\src\pkg\nonexistingpkg: The system cannot find the file specified.

                wanted /no such file or directory|does not exist/
FAIL
exit status 1
FAIL    code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc    13.594s

C:\go\path\others\src\code.google.com\p\go.tools\cmd\godoc>
